column3: Latest;Kampong Thom:------ At 4:40 pm on July 2
column5: there was a murder at Three Tan Bian Kang rubber plantation  located in Thmor Reang village
column8: Kampong Thom province.------The dead body was identified as Duan Thanh Hang
column9: a 52-year-old Vietnamese male living in Dong Long village
column13: who was working as a farm worker.------After being informed
column14: the police immediately arrived at the site to investigate and concluded that it was murder.------In this case
